resources.string: The rooms of the hotel are well-appointed and features simplicity at its best. The various types of rooms are standard A/c rooms, deluxe A/c rooms, deluxe non A/c rooms and standard non A/c rooms. The in-room amenities include telephone and in-room menu.
Hotel Hyderabad Heights is located at Masab Tank X road. Nearby places of tourists attraction are Lotus Pond (approx. 5km) and Birla Temple (approx. 3km).

Hotel Heights provides unparallel services and strive its best to cater the needs of patrons. Guests are ensured absolute convenience with a gamut of essential services like 24 hour room service, parking, travel desk, 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk and doctor on call.
